build.beforeBuildCommand: echo 'DEBUG: Starting beforeBuildCommand' && pwd && echo 'DEBUG: Current directory contents:' && ls -la && echo 'DEBUG: Parent directory contents:' && ls -la ../ && echo 'DEBUG: Root directory contents:' && ls -la ../../ && echo 'DEBUG: Looking for frontend directories' && find . -name '*frontend*' -type d && echo 'DEBUG: Attempting to navigate to frontend-daemon' && cd frontend-daemon && pwd && trunk build --release && echo 'DEBUG: Built frontend-daemon, now going to frontend-tauri' && cd ../frontend-tauri && pwd && trunk build --release && echo 'DEBUG: Completed both builds'
